It might be just your imagination, but you can hear
a faint sound from the other side of the door...
You hear faint breathing from inside...

Map177.Event[73].Page[0].list.message[0]: There is a statue depicting the new gods here...
Map177.Event[73].Page[0].list.message[1]: Someone has written "Save us" here with blood.
Map177.Event[74].Page[0].list.message[0]: There is a guest book one the table,
Map177.Event[74].Page[0].list.message[1]: "This nightmare has taken it's toll on me. I am
devolving into a something far lesser than the man
Map177.Event[74].Page[0].list.message[2]: "All the high morals and ethics have no value here.
The things I've done to survive..."
Map177.Event[74].Page[0].list.message[3]: "There is no place for a little miscreant like me in
the warmth of the sun anymore. I am a part of these dungeons
Map177.Event[74].Page[0].list.message[4]: "Part of this never-ending nightmare, just a one more
cog in this machine of fear and hunger..."
Map177.Event[74].Page[0].list.message[5]: "In a way I find it comforting. I have a definite place
Map177.Event[74].Page[0].list.message[6]: "But I am writing this here as a warning for anyone
who happens to step down to this darkness"
Map177.Event[74].Page[0].list.message[7]: "Do leave if it is still possible."
Map177.Event[74].Page[0].list.message[8]: You find a small booklet under the guest book,
you take the \c[2]Book of Fears\c[0] with you.

Map177.Event[252].Page[0].list.message[1: The mysterious man looks like a war veteran almost. His
right arm seems to be missing and there is something very
Map177.Event[252].Page[0].list.message[4: "Not like we are going to run into each other ever again."
Map177.Event[252].Page[0].list.message[9: "You could call me... a veteran of these dungeons."
Map177.Event[252].Page[0].list.message[1: "Some time ago I found a manuscript concerning the ancient
"There were multiple pages that were maps of sorts..."
"I was able to locate few of the map locations and there
were buried treasures hidden where the marker was set."
"A couple of the maps are complete mystery to me however..."
"Maybe they're hidden somewhere so deep where I simply
couldn't get yet, or maybe there's something I'm missing."
"In any case, I'm done with this place. I've played with my
"I can sell you the maps, for say... \c[2]50 silver coins\c[0]."
"How do I know the maps are legit?"
"Who knows... Maybe you can even find them."
Map177.Event[252].Page[0].list.message[2: "Are you kidding me? I don't think so."
"I got no ways to prove my words. So yeah..."
"Ha! I've witnessed horror you couldn't even begin to
Map177.Event[252].Page[1].list.message[0: "I can sell you the maps, for \c[2]50 silver coins\c[0].
Map177.Event[252].Page[1].list.message[1: "How do I know the maps are legit?"
Map177.Event[252].Page[1].list.message[3: "Who knows... Maybe you can even find them."
Map177.Event[252].Page[1].list.message[7: "Are you kidding me? I don't think so."
Map177.Event[252].Page[1].list.message[8: "I got no ways to prove my words. So yeah..."
Map177.Event[252].Page[2].list.message[0: "You clearly don't take me seriously. So I'm done with you."
Map177.Event[252].Page[3].list.message[0: "Who knows... Maybe you can even find them."
